page.title: 19SCARBOROUGH FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content: The Scarborough club has its home at the Athletic Ground on Seamer Road.The stadium has a modern floodlight system a large social club and a luxury grandstand with 800 seats. In recent seasons average attendance has been 900. The team players in the Gola League which includes the top semi-professional teams throughout the country. A nursery team plays in the Teesside league. All players are part time professionals and though the club is a limited company the only full time employees are the groundsman and promotions manager. A sponsorship deal worth around Â£10,000 has just been agreed with the St Nicholas Hotel, Scarborough. Admission to matches in 1985/6 season is Â£1.50 adults, 75p children and OAPs.Season tickets Â£25 standing and Â£32 for a seat.
